rows.label: qst201007_msg0002
rows.name:
A series of muggings targeting owners
of Core Crystals have taken place
throughout Alst in recent days.

rows.label: qst201007_msg0003
rows.name:
Suspects are calling themselves
"Core Crystal hunters". A similar
case was recently reported in Gula.

rows.label: qst201007_msg0004
rows.name:
The Department of Safety are
currently investigating these cases,
but the thieves remain at large.

rows.label: qst201007_msg0005
rows.name:
If you see suspicious activity, please
report it immediately to the local
authorities at Torigo Relay Base.
